explanations.metacritic: Metacritic scores are for complete games.  A single disc of a multi-disc game cannot be scored individually.
explanations.historical: As part of Final Fantasy VII, Disc 2 holds significant historical importance. It represents a crucial segment of a game that revolutionized 3D RPGs on the PlayStation, influencing countless titles that followed.  Its inclusion in the context of the full game is essential for representing the technological and narrative advancements of the time.
explanations.v_list: Given the collection already includes Final Fantasy VII, it's highly likely Disc 2 would also be on V's list, as it's an integral part of the complete experience.  The collection's focus on complete games strengthens this likelihood.
explanations.console_significance: Disc 2 is intrinsically linked to the PlayStation's success and the rise of RPGs on the platform.  Its technical achievements in 3D graphics and storytelling for the time were significant for the console.
explanations.mods_hacks: There's no indication of notable mods or hacks specific to Disc 2.  Preservation efforts should focus on the complete, original game.

overall_recommendation.reason: While lacking an individual Metacritic score, Disc 2's historical significance as an integral part of Final Fantasy VII, its importance to the PlayStation's game library, and its likely inclusion on V's list outweigh the absence of a standalone score.  Its inclusion provides a more complete representation of the game's impact.

explanations.metacritic: Metacritic scores are for complete games.  A single disc of a multi-disc game cannot be scored individually.
explanations.historical: Final Fantasy VII is undeniably historically significant. It revolutionized 3D RPGs on the PlayStation and is considered a landmark title in the genre.  This disc represents a crucial part of that complete experience.
explanations.v_list: Given the collection already includes Final Fantasy VII, it's highly likely that a hypothetical 'V' would also include this disc as part of the complete game.  The inclusion of Disc 2 suggests a preference for complete sets.
explanations.console_significance: As part of a landmark PlayStation title, this disc holds significant importance for the console's library and its role in the transition to 3D gaming.
explanations.mods_hacks: There is no indication of this being a notable mod or hack. It's a standard release disc.

overall_recommendation.reason: While lacking a Metacritic score, the historical significance of Final Fantasy VII, the likely inclusion on a curated list aiming for completeness, and its importance to the PlayStation console outweigh the absence of an individual disc score.  The collection already shows a commitment to preserving complete games, making the inclusion of Disc 3 essential for a proper representation of Final Fantasy VII.

explanations.metacritic: While Metacritic didn't exist in 1990, Super Mario World consistently ranks among the highest-rated SNES games and receives universal acclaim from critics and players for its innovative gameplay, level design, and overall polish.
explanations.historical: Super Mario World is a landmark title in gaming history. It refined and expanded upon the Super Mario Bros. formula, introducing new mechanics like Yoshi and the ability to switch between different paths, significantly impacting platformer design for years to come. Its influence on subsequent Mario games and the platforming genre is undeniable.
explanations.v_list: Given its critical acclaim, historical significance, and popularity, it's highly probable that Super Mario World would feature on many 'best of' lists, including a hypothetical 'V's recommended games' list.
explanations.console_significance: Super Mario World is arguably the defining title for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System. It showcased the console's capabilities and helped establish the SNES as a dominant force in the console market.  Its sales figures and cultural impact are unparalleled for the system.
explanations.mods_hacks: While not as extensive as some other games, Super Mario World has a dedicated modding community that has created numerous ROM hacks, offering altered gameplay, levels, and graphics.  These modifications demonstrate the game's enduring appeal and potential for creative expansion.

overall_recommendation.reason: Super Mario World scores exceptionally high across all criteria, particularly in historical significance and console significance. Its impact on the gaming industry and its status as a quintessential SNES title make it an essential inclusion in any curated collection of classic video games.  The presence of ROM hacks further enhances its value.

explanations.metacritic: Chrono Trigger consistently receives near-perfect scores across various review platforms, solidifying its status as a critically acclaimed masterpiece.  While Metacritic scores didn't exist in 1995, retrospective reviews easily place it above a 9.5/10.
explanations.historical: Chrono Trigger is a landmark title in RPG history, renowned for its innovative gameplay mechanics, compelling narrative, and memorable characters. Its influence on subsequent RPGs is undeniable, shaping the genre's conventions and expectations.
explanations.v_list: Given its widespread acclaim and enduring popularity, Chrono Trigger is highly likely to be on any serious gamer's 'all-time best' list.  Its inclusion in numerous 'greatest games of all time' lists supports this.
explanations.console_significance: Chrono Trigger is considered one of the best, if not *the* best, Super Nintendo RPG. It pushed the boundaries of the console's capabilities and remains a defining title for the system's library.
explanations.mods_hacks: While some ROM hacks exist, they are not significant enough to warrant preservation within a curated collection focused on the original game's historical importance.  The core game's quality overshadows any minor modifications.

overall_recommendation.reason: Chrono Trigger's exceptional critical acclaim, profound historical impact on the RPG genre, widespread popularity, and immense significance to the Super Nintendo console's legacy make it an essential inclusion in any curated collection of video games.  Its score far exceeds the thresholds set for inclusion.

explanations.metacritic: While Metacritic scores weren't available in 1997, retrospective reviews consistently place Final Fantasy VII very highly, often above 90.  Its impact and lasting influence easily justify a near-perfect score in this context.
explanations.historical: Final Fantasy VII is undeniably a landmark title. It popularized 3D graphics in the JRPG genre, redefined storytelling in video games, and significantly impacted the industry's approach to character design, music, and narrative structure. Its influence is still felt today.
explanations.v_list: Given the collection already includes other seminal RPGs like Chrono Trigger and other Final Fantasy titles, it's highly probable that a hypothetical 'V' would include Final Fantasy VII on their recommended list. Its widespread acclaim and impact make it a strong candidate.
explanations.console_significance: Released on the original PlayStation, Final Fantasy VII was a system seller and helped define the console's identity as a platform for high-quality RPGs.  It pushed the technical boundaries of the system and significantly contributed to its success.
explanations.mods_hacks: While not as extensive as some PC games, Final Fantasy VII has a substantial modding community that has created enhanced graphics, gameplay modifications, and even complete story overhauls.  Preserving notable mods would be valuable.

overall_recommendation.reason: Final Fantasy VII's historical significance, critical acclaim, and impact on the gaming industry are undeniable.  Its inclusion is crucial for a curated collection aiming to represent the evolution of RPGs and the PlayStation console.  The presence of other Final Fantasy VII entries suggests a deliberate focus on this title, further reinforcing its inclusion.

filtered_games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
filtered_games.id: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

evaluation.game_name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

explanations.metacritic: Ocarina of Time consistently ranks among the highest-rated games of all time, holding a near-perfect Metacritic score, reflecting widespread critical acclaim for its innovative gameplay, story, and world.
explanations.historical: Ocarina of Time is a landmark title, revolutionizing 3D adventure games with its innovative 3D engine, camera controls, and gameplay mechanics.  Its influence on game design is undeniable and continues to this day. It significantly advanced storytelling in games and popularized the action-adventure genre.
explanations.v_list: Given its immense popularity and critical acclaim, it's highly probable that Ocarina of Time would feature on any serious list of recommended games, especially those focusing on influential titles.
explanations.console_significance: Ocarina of Time is arguably the defining title of the Nintendo 64's lifespan, showcasing the console's capabilities and significantly contributing to its commercial success.  It's a must-have for any serious N64 collection.
explanations.mods_hacks: While some ROM hacks exist, they are not particularly significant or numerous compared to other games with larger modding communities.  The game's impact is primarily due to its original design.

overall_recommendation.reason: Ocarina of Time's exceptional Metacritic score, profound historical significance, widespread acclaim, and crucial role in the Nintendo 64's success make it an indispensable addition to any curated collection of historically important video games.  Its impact far outweighs the relatively minor presence of mods and hacks.

explanations.metacritic: While Metacritic didn't exist in 1991, retrospective reviews and its enduring popularity warrant a high score.  It's considered a classic.
explanations.historical: Sonic the Hedgehog was pivotal in the 16-bit console wars, challenging Nintendo's dominance and establishing Sega as a major player. Its influence on platformers and character design is undeniable.
explanations.v_list: Given the collection's existing titles,  'Sonic the Hedgehog' is likely on V's list. Its impact and popularity make it a strong candidate for any curated collection of classic games.
explanations.console_significance: Sonic is arguably *the* defining title for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive. Its success was instrumental in the console's sales and cemented its place in gaming history.
explanations.mods_hacks: While ROM hacks and mods exist for Sonic, they are not as significant or numerous as for some other titles in the collection.  The original game's importance overshadows its modding scene.

overall_recommendation.reason: The game's immense historical significance, its impact on the gaming industry, and its status as a defining title for the Sega Genesis far outweigh the relatively minor presence of mods and hacks.  Its inclusion is crucial for a comprehensive collection of classic games.

explanations.metacritic: While Metacritic didn't exist in 1989, Tetris's universal acclaim and enduring popularity across countless platforms warrant a perfect score.  Its simple yet addictive gameplay transcends scoring systems.
explanations.historical: Tetris is undeniably one of the most historically significant video games ever created. Its simple design masked a surprisingly deep and engaging gameplay loop that captivated millions worldwide. It popularized the puzzle genre and helped establish the video game industry's global reach.  Its success on the Game Boy was pivotal in that console's success.
explanations.v_list: Given its immense popularity and cultural impact, it's highly probable that Tetris would feature on almost any curated list of influential video games.  The only reason it isn't a perfect 10 is the subjectivity of 'V's' preferences.
explanations.console_significance: The Game Boy version of Tetris is legendary. It's often cited as a key factor in the Game Boy's phenomenal success, demonstrating the console's portability and the game's addictive nature.  It's practically synonymous with the handheld.
explanations.mods_hacks: While numerous ROM hacks and variations of Tetris exist, none are particularly noteworthy from a historical or innovative perspective.  Most are simple variations on the core gameplay.

overall_recommendation.reason: Tetris's overwhelming historical significance, cultural impact, and undeniable influence on the gaming industry far outweigh any minor shortcomings. Its inclusion is essential for any curated collection aiming to represent the evolution of video games.

explanations.metacritic: Metal Gear Solid received widespread critical acclaim upon release and maintains a very high Metacritic score, reflecting its innovative gameplay and storytelling.
explanations.historical: Metal Gear Solid is hugely significant for its advancement of 3D action-adventure games, its cinematic storytelling, and its influence on stealth game mechanics. It redefined the possibilities of the genre and continues to be studied and emulated.
explanations.v_list: Given the collection's existing titles, and Metal Gear Solid's status as a landmark title, it's highly probable that it would feature on V's list.  Its influence on gaming is undeniable.
explanations.console_significance: Metal Gear Solid was a PlayStation launch title that pushed the console's technical capabilities and helped establish the system as a major player in the 3D gaming market.  It was a system seller.
explanations.mods_hacks: While some community modifications exist, they are not particularly significant or widespread compared to other games in the collection.  Preservation efforts should focus on the original release.

overall_recommendation.reason: Metal Gear Solid's high Metacritic score, immense historical impact on the gaming industry, likely inclusion on V's recommended list, and significant contribution to the PlayStation's success make it a crucial addition to the curated collection.  Despite a low score for mods/hacks, its other strengths far outweigh this weakness.

explanations.metacritic: While Metacritic scores are for the full game, Disc 2 of Metal Gear Solid is intrinsically linked to the overall critical acclaim of the game, which received near-universal praise for its innovative gameplay, story, and cinematic presentation.  A score reflecting this is appropriate.
explanations.historical: Metal Gear Solid was hugely influential in shaping the stealth genre and cinematic storytelling in video games. Its impact on game design is undeniable, and Disc 2 is an integral part of that experience.
explanations.v_list: Given the collection already includes Metal Gear Solid, the likelihood of Disc 2 being on V's list is high, assuming V appreciates complete game experiences.  The inclusion of Disc 2 enhances the completeness of the collection's representation of the game.
explanations.console_significance: For the original PlayStation, Metal Gear Solid was a landmark title, pushing the console's technical capabilities and setting a new standard for 3D action-adventure games. Disc 2 is essential to the complete experience on that platform.
explanations.mods_hacks: This is a standard release of the game; there's no indication of modification or hacking.  Therefore, the score is 0.

overall_recommendation.reason: Despite already having Metal Gear Solid in the collection, including Disc 2 is crucial for preserving the complete and intended experience of this historically significant game.  The weighted average score, considering the high marks across all relevant criteria, strongly supports its inclusion.

explanations.metacritic: Beta versions of games don't receive Metacritic scores.  It's impossible to evaluate this criterion.
explanations.historical: A beta version of Super Mario World holds immense historical significance. It offers a glimpse into the development process of a landmark title, revealing design choices, discarded elements, and the evolution of the game before its final release.  This provides invaluable insight into game development history and the creative process behind one of the most influential platformers ever made.
explanations.v_list: While we don't know V's specific preferences, a beta version of such a critically acclaimed and historically important game is highly likely to be on a list curated by someone interested in game history and development. The rarity and unique perspective it offers would make it a strong candidate.
explanations.console_significance: For the Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES), Super Mario World was a defining title.  A beta version showcases the pre-release state of this pivotal game, offering a unique perspective on its development and impact on the SNES's library and the platformer genre.  The differences between the beta and the final release are significant enough to warrant its inclusion.
explanations.mods_hacks: This is not a mod or hack; it's a genuine pre-release build of the game.  Therefore, it doesn't fit this criterion.

overall_recommendation.reason: Despite the lack of a Metacritic score, the historical significance of a Super Mario World beta, its potential inclusion on a connoisseur's list, and its importance to the SNES's legacy outweigh the missing score.  The unique insights into the development process of a seminal title make this a valuable addition to the collection.
